title: 2nd Light Cavalry Division (France)
text:
The French 2nd Light Cavalry Division "(2e Division de Cavalerie Légère)" was a <a href="French%20Army">French Army</a> division active during <a href="World%20War%20II">World War II</a>.
World War II.
Battle Of France.
During the <a href="Battle%20of%20France">Battle of France</a> in May 1940 the <a href="Division%20%28military%29">division</a> contained the following units:
